content.question: Which of the following strategies is most likely to help identify the logic error?

choices.label: Changing random parts of the code and rerunning the program until the error is resolved
Inserting print statements throughout the code to check the calculations at various points in the execution
Relying on the compilerâ€™s error messages to detect the logic error
Running the program multiple times without making changes to see if the error corrects itself

content.answer: Inserting print statements throughout the code to check the calculations at various points in the execution

topic.text: 1.1: Introduction to Algorithms, Programming, and Compilers

skill.text: 1.A: Determine an appropriate program design to solve a problem or accomplish a task.
